plot: Andre and Sandra are in love but both are keeping secrets from each other. One day both decide to start afresh by telling each other the truth but the truth sometimes comes in double doses.
title: Traidos pela traição
plot_es: Andre and Sandra are in love but both are keeping secrets from each other. One day both decide to start afresh by telling each other the truth but the truth sometimes comes in double doses.
plot_en: Andre and Sandra are in love but both are keeping secrets from each other. One day both decide to start afresh by telling each other the truth but the truth sometimes comes in double doses.
